questions.question: Which of the following parameter will affect the pressure drop due to shock loss in the mine?

answers.a: Total pressure drop in the mine
answers.b: Frictional pressure drop in the mine

questions.question: On the basis of above experiment, which of the following parameters are not going to change on increasing the volume of the air?
Which of the following statement is false?

answers.a: Shock loss factor is directly proportional to the P<sub>shock</sub>
answers.b: Shock loss factor is inversely proportional to the square of the area of the cross section of the duct
answers.c: Shock loss factor is inversely proportional to the square of the quantity of air flow through the duct
answers.d: Shock loss factor is inversely proportional to density of the air

questions.question: What are the processes which leads to the development of Shock loss pressure at the bends?

answers.a: Constriction of airways at bends and hence contraction of air takes place
answers.b: Formation of eddies around the bends, intensity being more at corners
answers.c: Expansion of airways after the bend and hence expansion of air taking place

questions.question: Which of the following have the largest Equivalent length of bends?
